# Highlight Sync

Is a:: Processor

Implementation:: [Readwise Sync](https://app.heptabase.com/2f7caf87-d999-4778-8e30-61689601271e/card/8de8b69d-d609-4cf4-ad98-fcba7e4583ac#8dafdb42-fb03-4ae2-bb84-c6fedc30cabc)

Pushes [Highlight.md](./Highlight.md)s that made to various types of Content to the [Components](https://app.heptabase.com/2f7caf87-d999-4778-8e30-61689601271e/card/3e1c79e4-652c-40f7-b26e-977bb5b41928) that want them.
